anya-e1102n2:3_0: Saṅgho ca dullabho loke, sappurisāti dullabhā”ti.
anya-e1102n2:4_1: Tattha imasmiṁ sattaloke okāsaloke vā sabbaññusammāsambuddho dullabhova tathā hesa loko saṅkhāraloko,
anya-e1102n2:4_3: okāsalokoti tippabhedo hoti tesaṁ sampattivipatti ca evaṁ veditabbā tattha lujjati palujjatīti lokoti vacanatthena sattaloko veditabbo.
anya-e1102n2:4_4: Lokiyanti patiṭṭhahanti ettha sattanikāyāti vacanatthena okāsaloko veditabbo.
anya-e1102n2:4_5: Tathā hesa sattā avakasanti etthātiokāsoti vuccati so bhūmivasena apāyabhūmi,
anya-e1102n2:4_17: paranimmitavasavattī ceti sattavidhā hoti kāmasugatibhūmi sāpanāyaṁ ekādasavidhāpi kāmataṇhā avacarati etthāti vacanatthena kāmāvacarabhūmi nāma.
anya-e1102n2:4_20: mahābrahmā ca paṭhamajjhānabhūmi idaṁ agginā pariggahitaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e1102n2:4_23: ābhassarā ca dutiyajjhānabhūmi idaṁ āpena pariggahitaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e1102n2:4_26: subhakiṇhā ca tatiyajjhānabhūmi idaṁ vātena pariggahitaṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e1102n2:4_30: suddhāvāsā ca catutthajjhānabhūmiceti rūpāvacarabhūmi soḷasavidhā hoti. Avihā, atappā, sudassā, sudassī,
anya-e1102n2:4_36: Ettāvatā ekatiṁsappabhedāpi bhūmi avakasanti ettha sattanikāyāti vacanatthena okāsoti vuccati.
anya-e1102n2:4_38: Tiracchānaṁ pettivisayo asurakāyoti imesaṁ visuṁ bhūmi nāma natthi,
anya-e1102n2:4_39: manussabhūmiyaṁyeva yattha katthaci araññavanapatthādīsu nibaddhavāsaṁ vasanti soyeva padeso tesaṁ bhūmi.
anya-e1102n2:4_40: Manussabhūmito dvitālīsasahassayojano yugandharappamāṇo sineruno pañcamāḷindho cātumahārājikabhūmi.
anya-e1102n2:4_43: Iminā nayena yāva vasavattibhūmi dvitālīsasahassayojane tiṭṭhati,
anya-e1102n2:4_44: tasmā manussabhūmito yāva vasavattibhūmi dvesahassānipañcana hutāni duvesatasahassāni yojanāni honti,
anya-e1102n2:8_0: Gaṇanā nāma bhūmīsu, saṅkhyā evaṁ pakāsitā”ti.
anya-e1102n2:9_0: Tatupari brahmapārisajjādayo tayo brahmuno pañcapaññāsasatasahassa aṭṭhasahassayojane samatale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n2:9_2: Catutthabhūmiyaṁ pana vehapphalaasaññasattā tappamāṇe samatale ṭhāne tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n2:9_3: Tatuparisuddhāvāsabhūmiyo taṁtaṁ pamāṇe ṭhāne uparūpari tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n2:9_4: Catassopi arūpabhūmiyo tappamāṇe ṭhāne uparūpari tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e1102n2:9_5: Ettāvatā ca manussabhūmito yāva bhavaggā yojanānaṁ sattakoṭi ca aṭṭhārasalakkhā ca pañcanahutāni ca chasahassāni ca honti tenetaṁ vuccati porāṇehi.
anya-e1102n2:24_0: Esā ca vicāraṇā ṭīkā cariyamatena katā;
anya-e1102n2:27_0: Tāva sahassadhā loke, ettha te vattatī vaso”ti.
anya-e1102n2:28_2: tesaṁ vitthāro apubbaṁ katvā kathetuṁ asakkuṇeyyattā na vakkhāma imasmiṁ sattaloke okāsaloke ca sabbaññusammāsambuddhova dullabho,
anya-e1102n2:28_7: Tattha bahussutaṁ bhikkhuṁ pasaṁsantena ca na so tumhākaṁ sāvako nāma,
anya-e1102n2:28_8: buddhonāmesa cundāti bahussutassa bhikkhuno buddhabhāvaṁ anujānantena ca.
anya-e1102n2:29_0: Dhammakāyo yato satthā, dhammo satthukāyo mato;
anya-e1102n2:31_0: Vutte puthujjanopi upacāravasena vācanāmaggassa bodhattā anubuddho nāma.
anya-e1102n2:31_1: Ariyasāvako pana parato yosavasena cattāri saccāni bujjhati bujjhanamattameva vāti vacanatthena bujjhanasabhāvattā sāvakabuddho nāma.
anya-e1102n2:31_2: Yo pana khaggavisāṇakappo sayambhūñāṇena anaññabodhako hutvā sāmaṁ bujjhanatthena paccekabujjhattā paccekabuddho nāma.
anya-e1102n2:31_4: Yo pana saṅkhatāsaṅkhatappabhedaṁ sakalampi dhammajātaṁ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhavasena sammā pakārena
anya-e1102n2:31_5: sayaṁ pacitupāramitāsayambhūtena sayambhūñāṇena sayameva anaññabodhito hutvā savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṁ
anya-e1102n2:31_6: vigato dinakarakiraṇasamāgamena paramarucirasirīsobhaggappattiyā vikasitamiva padumaṁ aggamaggañāṇasamāgamena
anya-e1102n2:31_7: aparimitaguṇagaṇālaṅkatasabbaññutaññāṇappattiyā sabbadhamme bujjhi abujjhi aññāsīti sammāsambuddho, bhagavā,
anya-e1102n2:31_8: sova loke dullabho paccekasambuddhānampi hi ekasmiṁ kāle satasahassādivasena ekato pavattattā te dullabhāpi
anya-e1102n2:31_9: anacchariyajātattā paresaṁ maggaphalādhigamāya upanissayarahitattā ca sammāsambuddhova loke dullabho,
anya-e1102n2:32_0: Kathaṁ lokassa vipatti veditabbā tathā hesa loko vinassamāno tejenapi āpenapi vāyunāpi vinassati.
anya-e1102n2:32_1: Tassa vitthāro visuddhimaggādīsu vuccamānopi kesañci puggalānaṁ matena micchāgāhattā brahmūnaṁ āyunā minitepi asamānaṁ saṁvaṭṭasīmāpi viruddhā,
anya-e1102n2:32_2: tasmā tesaṁ vādaṁ apanetvā ganthato samānetvā vakkhāma.
anya-e1102n2:32_23: subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā yāva dutiyajjhānabhūmi udakena vilīyati.
anya-e1102n2:32_25: vehapphalato heṭṭhā yāva tatiyajjhānabhūmi vātena saṁvaṭṭati.
anya-e1102n2:32_26: Vitthārato pana jātikhetta āṇākhettavisayakhettavasena tiṇṇaṁ buddhakhettānaṁ āṇākhettaṁ vinassati.
anya-e1102n2:32_31: Yattha ratanasuttaṁ khandhaparittaṁ dhajaggaparittaṁ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṁ moraparittanti imesaṁ parittānaṁ ānubhāvo pavattati.
anya-e1102n2:32_33: Tattha jātikhettaāṇākhettāvasena dve khettāni ekato vinassanti.
anya-e1102n2:32_35: Tassa vināsoca saṇṭhahantañca evaṁ veditabbaṁ yasmiṁ samaye kappo agginā nassati,
anya-e1102n2:32_36: tadā ādito kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṁ ekameghavassaṁ vasi,
anya-e1102n2:32_38: sassesu gokhāyitamattesu jātesu gadrabharavaṁ viravanto ekabindupi na patati.
anya-e1102n2:32_39: Yadā pacchinnameva hoti tadā vassūpajīvino sattā kālaṁ katvā parittābhesu brahmabhūmīsu uppajjanti puññaphalūpajīvinopi
anya-e1102n2:32_41: evaṁ dīghassa addhuno accayena tattha tattha udakaṁ parikkhayaṁ gacchati,
anya-e1102n2:32_42: macchakacchapādi udakanissitā pāṇā kālaṁ katvā manussadevalokesu nibbattitvā jhānaṁ uppādetvā brahmaloke nibbattanti.
anya-e1102n2:32_45: tadā hi lokabyūhā nāma kāmāvacaradevā ukkhittasirā vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi muñcamānā rattavatthanivatthā
anya-e1102n2:32_46: ativiya virūpavesadhārino hutvā manussapathe vicarantā evaṁ ārocenti “mārisā bho ito vassasata sahassaccayena
anya-e1102n2:32_47: kappavuṭṭhānaṁ bhavissati ayaṁ loko vinassissati mahāsamuddopisussissati ayañca mahāpathavī sinerupabbatarājā
anya-e1102n2:32_48: ḍayhissati vinassissati yāvabrahmalokā vināso bhavissati mettaṁ mārisā bhāvetha. Karuṇaṁ, muditaṁ,
anya-e1102n2:32_52: Tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā ca bhummadevatā ca saṁvegajātā aññamaññaṁ muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññāni karitvā devaloke nibbattanti.
anya-e1102n2:32_53: Tattha sudhābhojanaṁ bhuñjitvā vāyo parikammaṁ katvā jhānaṁ paṭilabhanti,
anya-e1102n2:32_55: Ye pana niyatamicchādiṭṭhikā tesaṁ kammassa aparikkhayā aññacakkavāḷesu attano kammānurūpaṁ vipākamanubhonti.
anya-e1102n2:32_56: Teneva ahosikamme micchādiṭṭhivasena akattabbaṁ nāma pāpaṁ natthi,
anya-e1102n2:32_57: yato saṁsārakhāṇubhāvova nāma hotīti āha “diṭṭhi paramāni bhikkhave vajjānī”ti.
anya-e1102n2:32_59: “Aparāpariyakammavasena yato micchādiṭṭhisamādānato sappurisūpanissayavasena virājetvā bhavato vuṭṭhānaṁ nāma bhaveyyāti amhākaṁ khanti.
anya-e1102n2:32_60: Evaṁ devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattanti.
anya-e1102n2:32_61: Vassupacchedato pana uddhaṁ dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati.
anya-e1102n2:33_0: Pakatisūriye sūriyadevaputto atthi kappavināsakasūriye pana natthi.
anya-e1102n2:33_2: Kappavināsakasūriyobhāsena vigatadhūmavalāhakaṁ ādāsamaṇḍalaṁ viya nimmalaṁ hoti nabhaṁ ṭhapetvā gaṅgā, yamunā, sarabhū,
anya-e1102n2:33_4: imā pañca mahānadiyo ṭhapetvā avasesapañcasatakunnadīādīsu udakaṁ sussati tato dīghassa addhuno accayena
anya-e1102n2:33_5: tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati tasmiṁ pātubhūte pañca mahānadiyopi sussanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_6: Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati.
anya-e1102n2:33_7: Yassa pātubhāvā himavatī mahānadīnaṁ pabhavā sīhapatano,
anya-e1102n2:33_15: Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati,
anya-e1102n2:33_16: yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamuddo aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṁ na saṇṭhāti.
anya-e1102n2:33_17: Tato dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati,
anya-e1102n2:33_20: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo sūriyo pātubhavati,
anya-e1102n2:33_21: yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṁ ekajālaṁ hoti saddhiṁ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi yojanasatikādibhedā
anya-e1102n2:33_24: tattha kanakavimānaratanavimānāni jhāpetvā tāvatiṁsabhavanaṁ gaṇhāti etenūpāyena yāva paṭhamajjhānabhūmi gaṇhāti.
anya-e1102n2:33_25: Tattha tayopi brahmaloke jhāpetvā ābhassare āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n2:33_28: Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā pana sappitelajhāpanaaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā nibbāyi.
anya-e1102n2:33_29: Heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāro.
anya-e1102n2:33_30: Evaṁ kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāvajālaparicchedā saṁvaṭṭo nāma ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṁ nāma.
anya-e1102n2:33_31: Atha dīghassa addhuno accayena mahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamaṁ sukhumaṁ vassati.
anya-e1102n2:33_32: Anupubbena kumudanāḷayaṭṭhimusalatālakkhandhādippamāṇāhi dhārāhi vassanto koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu sabbaḍaḍḍhaṭṭhānaṁ pūretvā antaradhāyati.
anya-e1102n2:33_33: Taṁ udakaṁ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṁ karoti.
anya-e1102n2:33_38: Kathaṁ tāva mahantaṁ udakarāsiṁ vāto ghanaṁ karotīti ce.
anya-e1102n2:33_39: Vivarasampadānato taṁ vā tena piṇḍiyamānaṁ ghanaṁ kariyamānaṁ parikkhayamānaṁ anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati.
anya-e1102n2:33_40: Otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake pubbe brahmalokaṭṭhāne brahmapāri sajja-brahmapurohitamahābrahmāvasena paṭhamajjhānabhūmi paṭhamaṁ pātubhavati.
anya-e1102n2:33_41: Tato otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake catukāmāvacaradevalokaṭṭhāne anukkamena paranimmitavasavattī,
anya-e1102n2:33_44: Tato purimapathaviṭṭhānaṁ otiṇṇe pana udake balavavātā uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_45: Te taṁ pidahitadvāre dhamakaraṇe ṭhitaudakamiva nirussāsaṁ katvā nirujjhanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_46: Madhurodakaṁ parikkhayaṁ gacchamānaṁ upari rasapathaviṁ samuṭṭhāpeti sā vaṇṇasampannāceva hoti gandharasasampannā ca,
anya-e1102n2:33_47: nirudakapāyāsassa upari paṭalaṁ viya tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā tato cavitvā idhūpapajjanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_48: “Puññakkhayā vā”ti iminā brahmūnaṁ āyuparicchedaṁ appatvāva kammakkhayena maraṇaṁ viññāyati.
anya-e1102n2:33_50: Te aggaññasutte vuttanayena taṁ rasapathaviṁ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā āluppakāraṁ paribhuñjituṁ upakkamanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_52: andhakāro hoti te andhakāraṁ disvā bhāyanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_53: Tato nesaṁ bhayaṁ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṁ janayantaṁ paripuṇṇapaṇṇāsayojanaṁ sūriyamaṇḍalaṁ vā pātubhavati.
anya-e1102n2:33_54: Te taṁ disvā “ālokaṁ paṭilabhimhā”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṁ bhayaṁ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṁ janayanto uṭṭhito,
anya-e1102n2:33_55: tasmā sūriyo hotū”ti sūriyo tvevassa nāmaṁ karonti.
anya-e1102n2:33_56: Atha sūriye divasaṁ ālokaṁ katvā atthaṅgate “yampi ālokaṁ labhimhā,
anya-e1102n2:33_57: sopi no naṭṭho”ti puna bhītā honti.
anya-e1102n2:33_58: Tesaṁ evaṁ hoti “sādhuvatassa aññaṁ ālokaṁ labheyyāmā”ti.
anya-e1102n2:33_59: Tesaṁ cittaṁ ñatvā viya ekūnapaññāsayojanaṁ candamaṇḍalaṁ pātubhavati.
anya-e1102n2:33_60: Te taṁ disvā bhiyyosomattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṁ chandaṁ ñatvā viya uṭṭhito,
anya-e1102n2:33_61: tasmā cando hotū”ti candotvevassa nāmaṁ karonti.
anya-e1102n2:33_65: te ca kho apubbaṁ acarimaṁ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva pātubhavanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_66: Kathaṁ yathānāma kaṅgubhatte paccamāne ekappahāreneva bubbuḷakāni uṭṭhahanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_69: eke samasamā evameva thūpathūpaṭṭhāne pabbatā honti,
anya-e1102n2:33_71: samasamaṭṭhāne dīpāti evaṁ manussaloke saṇṭhite cātumahārājikā,
anya-e1102n2:33_76: Atha tesaṁ sattānaṁ rasapathaviṁ paribhuñjantānaṁ kammena ekacce vaṇṇavanto,
anya-e1102n2:33_77: ekacce dubbaṇṇā honti tattha vaṇṇavanto dubbaṇṇe atimaññanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_79: Bhūmipappaṭako pātubhavati atha nesaṁ teneva nayena sopi antaradhāyati,
anya-e1102n2:33_82: Akaṭṭhapāko sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso suddho sugandho taṇḍulapphalo.
anya-e1102n2:33_83: Tato nesaṁ bhājanāni uppajjanti te sālī bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyā ṭhapenti,
anya-e1102n2:33_86: na tassa sūpena vā byañjanena vā karaṇīyaṁ atthi.
anya-e1102n2:33_89: Tesaṁ taṁ oḷārikaṁ āhāraṁ āharataṁ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṁ sañjāyati.
anya-e1102n2:33_90: Atha nesaṁ tassa nikkhamanatthāya vaṇamukhāni pabhijjanti.
anya-e1102n2:33_97: Te asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā tassa asaddhammassa paṭicchādanahetu agārāni karonti.
anya-e1102n2:34_0: Te agāraṁ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena aññatarassa alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjantā sannidhiṁ karonti.
anya-e1102n2:34_1: Tato pabhuti kaṇopi thusopi taṇḍulaṁ pariyonaddhanti,
anya-e1102n2:34_3: Te sannipatitvā anuṭṭhunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā sattesu pātubhūtā,
anya-e1102n2:34_7: Athaññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṁ adinnaṁ ādiyati.
anya-e1102n2:34_8: Taṁ dvikkhattuṁ paribhāsitvā tatiyavāre leḍḍudaṇḍehi paharanti.
anya-e1102n2:34_9: Te evaṁ adinnādānakalahamusāvādadaṇḍadānesu uppannesu sannipatitvā cintayanti,
anya-e1102n2:34_15: Evaṁ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṁ tāva kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tena samayena
anya-e1102n2:34_16: tesu sattesu abhirūpataro ca dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṁ
anya-e1102n2:34_17: kātuṁ te taṁ upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā sammaniṁsu.
anya-e1102n2:34_22: Yañhi loke acchariyaṁ ṭhānaṁ bodhisattova tattha ādi purisoti evaṁ bodhisattaṁ ādiṁ katvā khattiyamaṇḍale
anya-e1102n2:34_24: Evaṁ candimasūriyapātu bhāvato yāva puna kappavināsakamahāmegho,
anya-e1102n2:34_26: Tenetaṁ vuccati megho jālaparicchinno saṁvaṭṭoti jālā meghaparicchinno saṁvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti vuccati.
anya-e1102n2:34_31: Tathā hi imasmiṁyeva vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyiasaṅkhyayyakappe buddhapacceka buddhasāvakacakkavattino uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n2:34_35: Tattha buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakacakkavattīhi puññavantapuggalehi asuññattā asuññakappo nāma.
anya-e1102n2:34_42: tesu yasmiṁ kappe ekova buddho uppajjati,
anya-e1102n2:34_52: Imāni pañcakappāniyeva saheva samodhānetvā jātattakīsotattakiyā nidāne.
anya-e1102n2:63_0: Te sabbepi sammāsambuddhe yāva arimetteyyā samodhānetvā
anya-e1102n2:69_0: Namassanagāthā pavattā sā ūnasaṅkhyāvaseneva katāva bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e1102n2:69_1: tathā hi amhākaṁ bhagavā porāṇabrahmadevabuddhaṁ ādiṁ katvā yāva porāṇasakyagotamā manasāva cintentassa
anya-e1102n2:69_2: sattaasaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni porāṇasakyagotamabuddhaṁ ādiṁ katvā yāva majjhimadīpaṅkarā vācāmattena
anya-e1102n2:69_4: Majjhimadīpaṅkarato paṭṭhāya yāva padumuttarabuddhā kāyaṅgavācaṅgavasena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni vītivattāni.
anya-e1102n2:69_6: Evamimesu vīsatiasaṅkhyeyyesu brahmadevaporāṇasakyagotamabuddhānamantare satta asaṅkhyeyye sabbaṁ sampiṇḍetvā
anya-e1102n2:69_7: ekasatasahassañca vīsati sahassañca pañcasahassāni ca honti.
anya-e1102n2:69_8: Porāṇasakyagotamamajjhimadīpaṅkarānamantare nava asaṅkhyeyye sabbaṁ sampiṇḍetvā tīṇisatasahassāni sattāsītisahassāni ca honti.
anya-e1102n2:69_9: Majjhimadīpaṅkarato yāva metteyyā aṭṭhavīsāti sabbaṁ samodhānetvā aṭṭhavīsañca dvādasasahassañca pañcasatasahassāni
anya-e1102n2:72_3: anuppannakappe pana suññakappotveva nāmaṁ labbhati tathā hi kappasaṇṭhahanakāle sabbapaṭhamaṁ mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhāneyeva paduminigabbhā uppajjati.
anya-e1102n2:72_4: Sā yasmiṁ kāle eko buddho uppajjissati,
anya-e1102n2:72_6: Taṁ disvā suddhāvāsabrahmuno nemittapāṭhakā arahanto imasmiṁ kappe eko buddho uppajjissatīti sañjātapītisomanassā
anya-e1102n2:72_7: hutvā aṭṭhaparikkhāre gahetvā brahmaloke ṭhapenti “yadā buddho uppajjissati,
anya-e1102n2:72_9: Evaṁ dve tayo cattāro pañca buddhā uppajjissanti,
anya-e1102n2:72_10: tadā dve tīṇi cattāri pañca paduminigabbhā aṭṭhaparikkhārehi saha uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n2:72_11: Tañca kho ekasmiṁ yeva nāḷekeka baddhā hutvā uppajjanti.
anya-e1102n2:72_12: Evaṁ kappasaṇṭhahanakālato paṭṭhāyeva imāni pañca nāmāni labbhantīti veditabbāni.
anya-e1102n2:72_13: Ettāvatā imasmiṁyeva vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappe buddhādayo mahesakkhā puññavanto cakkavattirājāno uppajjanti,
anya-e1102n2:72_15: Tattha āyukappo nāma tesaṁ tesaṁ sattānaṁ āyuparicchedo.
anya-e1102n2:72_16: Antarakappo nāma tattha sattharogadubbhikkhānaṁ aññatarasaṁvaṭṭanena bahūsu vināsamupagatesu avasiṭṭhasattasantā
anya-e1102n2:72_17: nappavattakusalakammānubhāvena dasavassato paṭṭhāya anukkamena asaṅkhyeyyāyukappappamāṇesu sattesu pana
anya-e1102n2:72_18: adhammasamādānavasena kamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukesu jātesu rogādīnamaññatarasaṁvaṭṭanena sattānaṁ
anya-e1102n2:72_20: Evaṁ paricchinnaantarakappavasena catusaṭṭhiantarakappo eko asaṅkhyeyyakappo vīsati antarakappappamāṇoti apare vadanti.
anya-e1102n2:72_21: Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyakappāni eko mahākappo nāma.
anya-e1102n2:72_22: Evaṁ tejo saṁvaṭṭavasena tāva mahākappānaṁ antaraṁ aggināva vinassati.
anya-e1102n2:72_23: Yasmiṁ pana samaye kappo udakena nassati,
anya-e1102n2:72_24: tadā āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṁ ayaṁ pana viseso yathā tattha dutiyasūriyo,
anya-e1102n2:72_25: evamidhapi kappavināsako khārudakamahāmegho vuṭṭhāti so ādito sukhumaṁ vassanto anukkamena mahādhārāhi koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṁ pūrento vassati.
anya-e1102n2:72_26: Khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā pathavīpabbatādayo vilīyanti taṁ udakaṁ vātena samantato dhāritaṁ pathavito
anya-e1102n2:72_27: yāva parittābhā appamāṇābhā ābhassarāti tayopi dutiyajjhānabhūmi udakaṁ gaṇhāti.
anya-e1102n2:72_28: Tattha tayopi brahmaloke vilīyāpetvā subha kiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati yāva aṇumattaṁ saṅkhāragataṁ atthi,
anya-e1102n2:72_30: Udakānugataṁ pana sabbasaṅkhāragataṁ abhibhavitvā sahasā vūpasamati antaradhānaṁ gacchati,
anya-e1102n2:72_31: heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṁ vuttasadisameva.
anya-e1102n2:72_32: Kevalaṁ panidha otiṇṇotiṇṇe udake ābhassarabrahmalokaṁ ādiṁ katvā lokapātubhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e1102n2:72_33: Subhakiṇhato cavitvā ābhassaraṭṭhānādīsu sattā nibbattanti etthāpi kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva kappavināsakaudakaparicchedo
anya-e1102n2:72_34: saṁvaṭṭo nāma paṭhamamasaṅkhyeyyakappo nāmāti cattāriasaṅkhyeyyakappāni vuttasadisāni evaṁ satta mahākappāni
anya-e1102n2:72_35: sattakkhattuṁ agginā vilīyitvā aṭṭhame mahākappe udakenapi vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṁ,
anya-e1102n2:72_36: evaṁ sattasattamahākappo sattasattavāraṁ agginā vilīyitvā aṭṭhame aṭṭhame vāre āpena vilīyitvā anukkamena
anya-e1102n2:72_37: tesaṭṭhimahākappāni paripuṇṇāni tadā āpavāraṁ paṭibāhitvā catusaṭṭhime mahākappe vātena vinassati tadā
anya-e1102n2:72_38: ādito kappavināsakamahāvāto vuṭṭhahitvāti sabbaṁ pubbe vuttanayameva.
anya-e1102n2:72_39: Ayaṁ pana viseso yathā agginā vināsakappe dutiyasūriyo,
anya-e1102n2:72_40: evamidhāpi kappavināsanatthaṁ vāto samuṭṭhāti so paṭhamaṁ sukhumarajaṁ uṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e1102n2:72_41: tato thūlarajaṁ saṇharajaṁ sukhumavālikaṁ sakkharapāsāṇādayoti yāva kūṭāgāramatte pāsāṇepi visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkheca uṭṭhāpeti,
anya-e1102n2:72_42: te pathavito nabhamuggatā na puna patanti,
anya-e1102n2:72_44: Yathānukkamena heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā vāto samuṭṭhahitvā pathaviṁ parivattetvā uddhaṁmūlaṁ katvā ākāse
anya-e1102n2:72_46: bhijjitvā te vegakkhittā ākāseyeva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṁ gacchanti cakkavāḷapabbatampi vāto ukkhipitvā
anya-e1102n2:72_47: ākāse khipati te aññamaññaṁ ghaṭṭayantā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti eteneva bhūmaṭṭhakavimānāni ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni
anya-e1102n2:72_48: ca vināsento chakāmāvacaradevaloke nāsetvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni vināseti.
anya-e1102n2:72_51: sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññaṁ samāgantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti.
anya-e1102n2:72_54: subhaṇiṇhāti tayopi tatiyajjhānabhūmī vāto gaṇhāti tattha tayopi brahmaloke vināsetvā vehapphalaṁ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e1102n2:72_55: Evaṁ sabbaṁ saṅkhāragataṁ vināsetvā sayaṁ vinassati,
anya-e1102n2:72_56: heṭṭhā ākāsena saha upari ākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṁ vuttasadisaṁ.
anya-e1102n2:72_57: Idha pana subhakiṇhabrahmalokaṁ ādiṁ katvā loko pātubhavati.
anya-e1102n2:72_61: paṭhamamasaṅkhyeyyaṁ nāmāti cattāri asaṅkhyeyyakappāni eko mahākappo nāmāti sabbaṁ tejosaṁvaṭṭe vuttanayameva.
anya-e1102n2:74_0: “Satta satta gginā vārā, aṭṭhame aṭṭhame dakā;
anya-e1102n2:75_0: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā.
anya-e1102n2:78_0: Tasmā tiṇṇampi paṭhamajjhānatalānaṁ ekakappepi avināsābhāvato sakalakappe tesaṁ sambhavo natthīti asaṅkhyeyya
anya-e1102n2:78_2: Dutiyajjhānatalato paṭṭhāya pana paripuṇṇamahākappavasena āyuparicchedo daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e1102n2:78_4: Yadi dutiyajjhānatalato paṭṭhāya paripuṇṇamahākappavasena āyuparicchedo siyā,
anya-e1102n2:78_5: kathaṁ ābhassarādīsu brahmūnaṁ aṭṭhamahākappādivasena āyu paripuṇṇaṁ siyā,
anya-e1102n2:78_6: tathā hi paṭhamajjhānatalaṁ sattasu vāresu agginā vinassati.
anya-e1102n2:78_7: Aṭṭhame vāre yāva ābhassarā udakena vinassati puna sattavāresu agginā paṭhamajjhānatalaṁ,
anya-e1102n2:78_8: puna aṭṭhamevāre udakena dutiyajjhānatalaṁ vinassatīti evaṁ aṭṭhame vāre āpavāraṁ paṭibāhitvā yāva subhakiṇhā
anya-e1102n2:78_9: vātena vinassati evaṁ catusaṭṭhi paripuṇṇā hotīti saccaṁ,
anya-e1102n2:78_10: heṭṭhāvivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī asaṅkhyeyyakappavasena eko satta mahākappāni cāti aṭṭha kappāni ābhassarabrahmūnaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e1102n2:78_11: Catusaṭṭhikappesupi vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappavasena eko te saṭṭhimahākappāni cāti catusaṭṭhikappāni
anya-e1102n2:78_12: subhakiṇhānaṁ brahmūnaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ hoti tena vuttaṁ porāṇehi.
anya-e1102n2:79_0: Satta satta’gginā vārā, aṭṭhame aṭṭhame dakā;
anya-e1102n2:80_0: Catusaṭṭhi yadā puṇṇā, eko vāyuvaro siyā’ti.
anya-e1102n2:84_0: Imissā gāthāya “ābhassarāti”ca “subhakiṇhato”ti ca “vehapphalato”ti ca abhividhivasena vuttabhāvañca
anya-e1102n2:84_1: samatalabhāvepi seṭṭhabhūmittā paṭṭhānavasena vuttabhāvañca amaññitvā suddhāvāsabhūmīsu viya uparūparivasena
anya-e1102n2:85_0: “Pañcabhūmi naṭṭhā aggi, aṭṭha bhūmi naṭṭhā dakā;
anya-e1102n2:86_0: Navabhūmi naṭṭhā vātā, lokanaṭṭhā tadā siyuṁ.
anya-e1102n2:87_0: Paṭhame aggi dvattiṁsa, dutiye ādi soḷasa;
anya-e1102n2:88_0: Dutiyabhūme majjhe aṭṭhamaṁ, taṁ chappaññāsa vārakaṁ.
anya-e1102n2:91_0: Vadanti tesaṁ vāde ābhassarato heṭṭhā pañcabhūmi agginaṭṭhā,
anya-e1102n2:91_2: Samataladīpanatthaṁ sandehacchedanatthaṁ evaṁ gahitāti ekabhavapariyosānaṁ sandhāya paṭisandhibhavañcāti ādi vuttanti.
anya-e1102n2:91_3: Imissāpi atthaṁ duggahitena gahetvā paṭisandhibhavaṅgavasena sadisabhāvameva sandhāya vuttanti parikappenti
anya-e1102n2:91_4: so ayuttarūpo viya dissati ativiya micchāgāho ca hoti aggaññasuttavisuddhimaggādīhi virujjhanato saṁvaṭṭasīmāpi
anya-e1102n2:91_7: catutthajjhānatalaṁ upādāya vātena vinassatīti vuttavacanenāpi virujjhateva tasmā “ābhassarā”ti ca “subhakiṇhato”ti
anya-e1102n2:91_9: Aññathā “upari pabbatā devo vassatī”ti ettha viya ābhassarasubhakiṇhavehapphalānaṁ tena tena saṁvaṭṭena vināsopi na bhaveyya.
anya-e1102n2:91_11: Evaṁ buddho ca dullabho loke ti imassa attho vuttoyeva.
